entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
